title: Fix it.
body: Cant log in, fix it yeah?

replies.body:
Let's fix this together! There are a number of steps that may resolve this, but by far, our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) resolves most of the login issues I've ever seen crop up, since an unstable or poor connection to the server commonly causes this.

Hit me up if you still experience this after taking those steps.
